messages.title: THIS THURSDAY vote to protect our NHS
messages.content: The NHS is in crisis under this Conservative Government. And Donald Trump has made it clear the NHS would be part of negotiating any trade deals with the US. We need hardworking Liberal Democrat MPs fighting to safeguard and improve our NHS

keyPolicies.policyTitle: INVEST IN SCHOOLS AND OUR NHS

issues.health: NHS drugs bill could soar if Johnson signs Trump trade deal.

contactInformation.address: LDHQ, 8-10 Great George Street, London, SW1P 3AE
